name: Mike Kowalski
description: Raised on the streets ofNight City, Mike joined theTyger Clawswhen he was 11 years old. By the time he was 12, he was already dealing for them. At the age of 15, he left the Tyger Claws to make a name for himself by doing gigs for various fixers. In2076, he had a short relationship withChristine Markov, the owner of a market stand atCherry Blossom Market. At some point in 2077, his elbow joints were repaired byCharles Bucksand he took on a gig fromRegina Jonesto steal secretMilitechdata fromIsis Sothos's computer under the folder name "Tenebris".Mike gets captured but Regina hiresVto free him.
